text: Pajomʙaronaşon guftand: «Ojo dar zoti Alloh va jaktoparastii Ū, ki ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin ast, şakke hast? Şumoro da'vat mekunad, to gunohonatonro ʙijomurzad va to muddati muajjan şumoro zinda guzorad va dar dunjo azoʙaton nakunad». Guftand: «Şumo ʙa çuz odamī, monandi mo kasi digar nested. Mexohed moro az on cī padaronamon meparastidand, ʙozdored va dar haqiqat ʙudani on ci ki megūed ʙaroi mo dalele ravşan ʙijovared!»
